name: Guesscapitals
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess capitals
des: Guess Capitals is an Alexa skill that provides a fun way to learn the name of capitals and countries of all the world. This skill is a game that asks the user for 10 random countries of the selected continent. The user also has to choose the game mode, capitals or countries, to guess the corresponding names. Each time the user answers a question, the skill validates it, giving the result (correct or incorrect) and the right answer if the provided one was wrong. Guess Capitals gives different messages to motivate the users to keep learning and having fun with this incredible game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
